original_text: When the officials of Judah heard these things, they came up from the king's house to the house of the Lord and took their seat in the entry of the New Gate of the house of the Lord.
korean_text: 유다의 고관들이 이 말을 듣고 왕궁에서 여호와의 성전으로 올라가 여호와의 성전 새 대문의 입구에 앉으매

sentences.original_text: When the officials of Judah heard these things,
they came up from the king's house to the house of the Lord
and took their seat in the entry of the New Gate of the house of the Lord.
sentences.korean_translation: 여호와의 집 새 문 어귀에 앉았습니다.
